text: June 18, 2025 We may earn a commission when you click links to retailers and purchase goods. More info. Samsung is shipping out more updates to Galaxy Watch models, this time for the Galaxy Watch 4 and Watch 4 Classic. Inside, the changelog lists performance improvements, as well as the latest available security patch. In this case, both watches are receiving the March security patch. It’s not the newest, but it’s certainly newer than the October patch it was running previously. Below you’ll find the latest software version numbers. Galaxy Watch 4: R865USQU1IYCD (40mm) R875USQU1IYCD (44mm) Galaxy Watch 4 Classic: R885USQU1IYCD (42mm) R895USQU1IYCD (46mm) Go snag it. // Verizon
html:
June 18, 2025

We may earn a commission when you click links to retailers and purchase goods. More info.

Samsung is shipping out more updates to Galaxy Watch models, this time for the Galaxy Watch 4 and Watch 4 Classic.

Inside, the changelog lists performance improvements, as well as the latest available security patch. In this case, both watches are receiving the March security patch. It’s not the newest, but it’s certainly newer than the October patch it was running previously.

Below you’ll find the latest software version numbers.

  • Galaxy Watch 4:
    • R865USQU1IYCD (40mm)
    • R875USQU1IYCD (44mm)
  • Galaxy Watch 4 Classic:
    • R885USQU1IYCD (42mm)
    • R895USQU1IYCD (46mm)

Go snag it.

// Verizon
